identity.mission: Create a Web3 NFT Marketplace that feels like a high-end digital gallery, not a generic SaaS. Dark, immersive, and electric.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Brutalism with Glassmorphism.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel 'expensive' and 'secure'.
Content is King: The NFT art is the hero; the UI is the frame.
Zoom In: Big, bold details for NFT previews.
Negative Space: Luxurious gaps between collections.

headings.usage: Main page titles, section headers, NFT names. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

mono.usage: Wallet addresses, transaction hashes, code snippets.

primary.description: Acid Lime - Use for Primary CTAs (Buy Now, Connect Wallet). High visibility against dark backgrounds.

glassmorphism.cards: backdrop-filter: blur(12px); background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);

buttons.primary: bg-[#CCFF00] text-black font-bold hover:bg-[#B3E600] rounded-full px-8 py-3 transition-transform hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(204,255,0,0.4)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white hover:bg-white/10 rounded-full px-8 py-3 transition-colors
buttons.ghost: text-white/70 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.nft_card: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-white/5 border border-white/10 hover:border-[#CCFF00]/50 transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-1 hover:shadow-2xl
cards.collection_card: relative h-[400px] rounded-3xl overflow-hidden group cursor-pointer

inputs.default: bg-black/50 border border-white/10 focus:border-[#CCFF00] text-white rounded-lg px-4 py-3 outline-none transition-colors placeholder:text-white/20

navigation.header: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 border-b border-white/5 bg-[#050505]/80 backdrop-blur-xl h-20 flex items-center

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is at least 4.5:1 against background. Use lighter grays (#A1A1AA) for secondary text, never dark gray.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings using the primary color (#CCFF00).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' and 'clsx' 'tailwind-merge' if not present.
2. THEME: Update tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors (primary: #CCFF00, background: #050505).
3. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
4. COMPONENTS: Build 'Card', 'Button', 'Input' components first using the styles defined above.
5. LAYOUT: Use the 'Tetris' grid for the Explore page. Don't make it a boring grid of equal squares.
6. WALLET: The 'Connect Wallet' button must be the most prominent element in the header.
7. MOCK DATA: Use the provided image URLs for all mock data. Do not use placeholders.
8. NO AI: Do not add any 'AI Generated' tags or features. This is a pure Web3 marketplace.
9. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (e.g., 'connect-wallet-btn', 'buy-now-btn').
universal_guidelines: Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
